title: Doubleclicking on import statement transfers to referenced type
description: When double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline, the editor opens on the target type instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
OB: Double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline does not open the editor on the unit hosting the import reference.
EB: When double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline, the editor should open on the unit hosting the import reference.
SR: Modify the behavior so that double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline opens the editor on the unit hosting the import reference.
